title: Software Engineer
description:
**Software development that makes a difference**


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. Now we are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.

  


**What you'll do**


As an **Infotainment Software Developer**, you will be a part of an agile team, working closely with other software engineers, testers, and architects. You will collaborate with UX, Designers and other stakeholders to define a coherent end-to-end solution. As part of R&D organization you will have the opportunity to actively contribute for generating innovative ideas and solutions. Additionally, the position is located at our offices in Lindholmen in Gothenburg.

  


**What you'll bring**


In general, we are looking for Senior Embedded Software Engineers with C, C++, Python as their main language and an understanding of system architecture.


To be successful in this role, your experience likely includes:

  


* Embedded Software Development of complex software products using C++, C or Python
* Embedded OS or Linux / QNX
* Test automation experience is good to have, Pytest, Good to have knowledge of Android testing frameworks.
* Working in a CI environment
* Experience in Android Automotive Platform is must.
* Experience from Automotive Infotainment.

  

  

We also see that you have:


* Fluency in spoken and written English
* University degree in Electrical or Electronic or similar.
* A Driver’s license (B-level) will also be ideal.

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable, and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones, and the people around them.


Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations so you can reach your full potential.


For the right person, an inspiring, and creative workplace awaits. Did you know that every Volvo Cars employee worldwide has the right to our Family Bond, our new all-gender, paid parental leave policy? You’ll also enjoy a culture and benefits package that’s made us one of the world’s most awarded and progressive employers.


By 2025, we aim to sell 1.2 million cars annually, 50% of which will be electric vehicles and sold directly to customers through digital channels. Join us on the journey of a lifetime as we create the driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Localization Manager
description:
At EasyPark, we love cities. We love them for work, for play, and everything in between. That’s why our vision is to make cities more livable! EasyPark Group is a global company and a true leader in its domain. There is a clear ambition to quickly grow in coverage and offer our services to more customers and partners.


This is an exciting opportunity to become part of the EasyPark team as our first Localization Manager. You will play a key role in our future success and have a true opportunity to make a real impact and difference for our users and our business!

**Firstly, a bit about the team**


As a Localization Manager you’ll work out of our central Product Design team, together with some 20 UX designers, writers, and researchers. You’ll report to our UX Writing Lead, and work closely with partners and stakeholders across the organization.
  

  

The larger product organization consists of over 450 talented specialists within product, engineering, design and analytics, located in Stockholm, Amsterdam, Basingstoke, Tallinn and Atlanta.

**What you’ll be doing:**

* You’ll be responsible for making sure that all EasyPark users across the globe get the same excellent experience, regardless of which language their device is set to.
* This role is our first that’s dedicated to localization, so we’re looking for a trailblazer who’s motivated to organize and build our localization processes, and who has the necessary understanding of linguistic complexity to make it happen.
* You’ll keep in close contact with our product managers and your main focus will be on content and translations. But we’ll also rely on you for direction on matters like internationalization and local demands.
* You’ll be coaching our internal translators crew who work in different roles but set aside time every week to translate our products. They have excellent knowledge of our products and the local needs and quirks, but they need you to provide consistency, documentation, and keep it all together.
* You’ll also be liaising with our developers, driving standardization and cooperating around the translation management system and other localization matters.
* And, perhaps more than anything, you’ll be our localization champion throughout the organization, educating us and pushing our localization efforts forward.

**Key responsibilities:**

* Plan and execute localization roadmap through communication and collaboration with stakeholders.
* Provide glossaries, training, reference materials, and support for our localizers.
* Manage and resolve questions between multiple localization stakeholders (translators, designers, developers, product managers, local organizations etc).
* Manage, develop, and refine our localization tools and workflows.
* Be the champion for internationalization, culturalization, and localization. to ensure any cultural and technical localization issues are caught early.
* Engage and build relationships across the organization and evangelize localization and internationalization best practices
* Plan and manage localization schedules, collaborating cross-functionally to manage timelines
* Drive initiatives to foster innovation within strategic areas of focus such as internationalization, data, quality, tools and process optimization

**What you’ll bring to the team**

* 5+ years of experience in localization management
* Demonstrated knowledge of internationalization and localization standards
* Excellent communication skills
* Fluent English, both written and spoken
* Solid understanding of app and web development processes
* Curiosity, organizational skills, and great attention to detail
* Passion for building relationships and working together in a diverse team across departments
* Experience of prioritizing and managing multiple projects simultaneously
* Patience and ability to continuously move things forwards, inch by inch
* Previous experience working with a Translation Management System (TMS) and other tools like, JIRA, Figma, and Confluence

  

*We expect you to share a portfolio of your favorite projects, so we can see how you work and your track record of shipping excellent products across markets and languages.*


This role is based in **Stockholm,Sweden.**

 **What we offer**

* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurances & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurances
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Mental well-being support via Blue Call
* Wellness reimbursement: 5000 SEK/year

**Life at EasyPark**


We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.

title: Fullstack
description:
**Rollen:**  

* Faciliterar och möjliggör den bästa möjliga lösningsdesignen och tekniska lösningen, med fokus på en helhetssyn från kundens perspektiv.
* Använder din djupa kunskap om produktens tekniska uppsättning och användning för att kontinuerligt iterera och leverera produktförbättringar tillsammans med dina kollegor och Produktägare.
* Säkerställer att våra lösningar är säkra, robusta och hållbara.
* Underlättar samarbetet mellan ingenjörer, Produktägare och UX-designer för att översätta krav till användarberättelser och tekniska lösningar.
* Främjar förstklassiga mjukvaruutvecklingsmetoder för att kontinuerligt leverera högkvalitativa funktioner och förbättringar.
* Använder, förespråkar och sprider moderna agila mjukvaruutvecklingsmetoder och bidrar till att utveckla goda ingenjörsstandarder i ditt team och i våra utvecklarkommuniteter.

 **Ska-krav:**

* Mer än 6 års erfarenhet av:
* Angular (version 14 och uppåt), HTML5, CSS, TypeScript, Azure DevOps, Git & Gitflow, MS Azure, MS Visual Studio
* Erfarenhet av:
* C# (.NET Framework + .NET Core)
* Om du har använt SonarQube och PowerShell, är det ännu bättre!
* Du vet hur man översätter produkt- och affärsmål till tekniska lösningar
* Du har en universitetsutbildning inom Informationsteknologi och ingenjörsvetenskap
* Du har arbetat som Full Stack-utvecklare i över 5 år och erfarenhet av IT-arkitektur är ett plus
* Du talar flytande svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt

  

**Var god förklara hur du uppfyller alla kraven.**  

  

**Omfattning:** 100%  

**Ort:** Stockholm  

**Period**: 21-10-2024-30-06-2025  

**Sista ansökningdag: 14-10-2024**  

  

*Vi presenterar löpande. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: IT Uppdrag
description:
Vi söker en .NET utvecklare till myndighet inom det svenska kraftsystemet.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Du kommer vara anställd av Centio Consulting Group AB och arbeta som konsult.


Tjänsten är på heltid, och säkerhetsprövning krävs.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Myndigheten är den som ansvarar för att elöverföringssystemet är säkert, miljöanpassat och kostnadseffektivt – i dag och i framtiden. Den drivs i form av ett statligt affärsverk, och har drygt 1400 medarbetare varav de flesta arbetar på huvudkontoret i Sundbyberg.  

  

Mycket händer inom elmarknads- och kraftsystemområdena, bl.a. genom energiomställning och utökat nordiskt och europeiskt samarbete. Ett flertal spännande projekt pågår hos myndigheten där de utvecklar bl.a. olika stödsystem för att möta nya behov. Myndigheten söker nu en systemutvecklare .NET, som ska förstärka projekt och förvaltning.
  

  

Uppdraget omfattar att vara systemutvecklare i viktiga utvecklings- och implementeringsprojekt, Uppdraget kan även innebära arbete i andra projekt och förvaltningar där utveckling och hantering av befintliga system ingår.


Ett projekt som konsulten kommer att arbeta i omfattar realisering av ett nytt system som används som logg för de analyser som driftanalytikerna arbetar med. Dessutom skapar systemet data för att beräkna kapaciteter i samarbete med de övriga nordiska länderna. I teamet finns utvecklare, kravanalytiker, UX-Designer, lösningsarkitekt, testare, verksamhetsexpert samt projektledare. Myndigheten arbetar agilt och leveranser sker i sprintar. Systemet som utvecklas ska också möta högt ställda krav på IT säkerhet.


Att konsulten är intresserad av systemarkitektur och IT arkitektur ser myndigheten som en fördel. Att utveckla och testa med IT-säkerhet i fokus och är intresserad av systemarkitektur och säkerhet är ett plus.  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**

  

* Rollen som systemutvecklare i projekt och förvaltningar kan innehålla följande arbetsuppgifter:
* Design och arkitektur av systemlösningar
* Ansvara för kravhantering relaterat till objektet
* Utveckling och test av systemlösningar, både back-end och webb
* Ta fram eller uppdatera dokumentation i form av krav- och designdokument
* Ta fram eller uppdatera systemdokumentation
* Samarbete inom teamet men även med andra delar av organisationen
* Hantering och prioritering av backlogg i scrum team

**Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet på en myndighet under de senaste 10 åren
  

Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling i Visual Studio och .Net under de senaste 8 åren
  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av front-endutveckling med .Net Razor pages under de senaste 5 åren
  

Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling mot MS-SQL databaser under de senaste 8 åren
  

Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med .Net Core under de senaste 8 åren
  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med Entity Framework Core under de senaste 5 åren
  

Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla REST API:er under de senaste 8 åren

**Meriterande**

Deltagit i minst ett projekt där Azure DevOps har använts för ärende- och kravhantering under de senaste 5 åren
  

Erfarenhet av minst 1 års arbete som produktägare under de senaste 8 åren  

Erfarenhet från minst ett projekt där uppsättning av CI/CD pipe-lines genomförts under de senaste 5 åren  

Erfarenhet av minst 2 års arbete inom elmarknads eller kraftsystemområdet under de senaste 8 åren  

Erfarenhet av minst ett uppdrag att ha arbetat med systemarkitektur





**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: E-commerce Analyst
description:
**Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights, TUI, etc.**

**Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2500 passionate professionals is what makes us the industry’s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India, Uruguay and Poland.**

**The role**  

We are seeking an E-commerce Analyst who embraces the combination of an entrepreneurial sales mindset and analytics. You are a data-driven professional focused on creating conversion-centric experiences to drive the metrics that matter the most for us as an e-commerce team. As an E-commerce Analyst you will be a key player in a test focused e-commerce team and responsible for optimizing CR and the user experience on both a global and local market level.


You will be working with the whole A/B-testing process in a very cross-functional environment including other e-commerce analysts, product managers, designers, product owners and developers. With a strong sales focus, you will drive insights from analyzing both qualitative and quantitative research, set up and execute actions based on your insights. You will drive both feature development and sales actions.


Alongside continuously driving CR-development you will be project managing key initiatives within the e-commerce field. You will project lead both strategic initiatives as well as project origin from your research and insights.


You should have an understanding and hands-on experience with A/B testing, website analytics and the UX-conversion tactics that help drive both performance and insights.


Responsibilities

* Responsible to drive CR-development and e-commerce KPIs on specific markets
* Analyze user data and KPIs throughout the customer journey and drive actionable insights
* End-to-end management of A/B tests and coordination with stakeholders
* End-to-end management of feature development including setting UX- and tech requirements in close collaboration with PO, tech lead and UX-designer.
* Project management of e-commerce related projects

**Requirements**


Building strong relationships and close collaboration with stakeholders, ux-designers, Product owners, developers and team members.

* Demonstrating a passion for continuous learning, improving and an entrepreneurial spirit to optimize our sales and customer experience.
* Experience in A/B-testing and relevant degree
* A need to understand user behavior
* Experience in different analytic tools, GA, QlikView, Looker
* Preferable basic front-end development knowledge and GTM
* Preferable experience in SEO
* Strong communication skills in English and Swedish (both spoken and written)

**Benefits**


Working at Etraveli Group means working at a fast-growing company with high ambitions in becoming the number one Online travel agency worldwide. The culture at the company embraces complexity and we like to keep the entrepreneurial spirit even as we grow into being a larger company. You will have awesome colleagues with whom you will have fun solving complex problems in a fast-moving business.  

We also offer:

* A flexible working environment. We work on a hybrid-model where you can choose to work two days from home and you will have two weeks per year that you can choose to work from a remote location
* Central office location in the City – We are located on Regeringsgatan in Stockholm, a stone's throw from public transport and lunch restaurants.
* Healthcare allowance – Each employee receives a maximum allowable amount each year according to the Swedish Tax Agency to spend on health-promoting activities such as a gym card, massage etc.
* Pension and health insurance – Through partners we offer a comprehensive pension and health insurance so that you can get help quickly in case of an accident  

  

**As part of this recruitment process, we will be conducting background checks. You will be able to read more information and give your consent to this process in the application form.**

  

At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds. During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.  

  

Welcome to Etraveli Group!
company_description: Etraveli Group is a global platform for flights, an air technology company with a presence across all continents.

title: Software Engineer
description:
About Mindler
  
Mindler was founded in 2018 by two psychologists and a doctor with a shared vision of creating a world with improved mental health. Thanks to our dedicated tech teams, who developed our app and iCBT modules, Mindler has emerged as a leading provider, transforming the mental health industry.
  
**Our tech organization is split into three teams:** Growth, Treatment and Operational Efficiency. All teams work full-stack across our different applications like the patient app, psychologist web platform and back office systems.
  
  

**The Role:**  

As a Software Engineer, you will be part of our Growth team, which is responsible for making sure our new patients have the best possible welcoming experience, and make sure they are guided to the right treatment and psychologist.. You'll work on both the app platform and the public web, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to develop features, optimize processes, and ensure the technical foundation is strong for future growth. If you’re passionate about building innovative solutions and improving healthcare experiences, we want to hear from you!
  
  

**What you’ll be doing:**  

Work on our app (React native/Typescript) and our public web (NextJS/Typescript, Contentful CMS), enhancing the patient journey and optimizing user experiences.
  
  

Develop and maintain backend services using Lambdas, APIs, and other cloud technologies (AWS/Typescript).
  
  

Collaborate with Product, Content, Marketing, and other tech teams to develop and deploy high-quality features.
  
  

Our stack is Typescript on AWS with some data parts in GCP.
  
  

Optionally contribute to the design and UX.
  
  

Continuously streamline development processes to improve time-to-market and quality.
  
  

Who are you?
  
You have a bachelor in computer science (or equivalent) and over 3+ years of experience developing app and web applications, primarily using React-Native, NextJS, and TypeScript. While these are the core technologies we use, we value adaptability and believe that the right mindset is more important than any specific language.
  
You have a background of full-stack development from modern software development teams and you have a keen eye for UX/UI design. Additionally, you have experience from working in backend API’s, in cloud solutions and with automated testing frameworks.
  
  

**It’s a plus if you have experience with:**  

NodeJS
  
  

tRPC
  
  

AWS
  
  

CloudFormation & CDK
  
  

CMS / Contentful
  
  

App e2e testing
  
  

Figma
  
  

EU Accessibility Act compliance
  
  

User testing
  
  

What can we offer?
  
If you thrive on collaborating with talented colleagues in the office, but also appreciate the flexibility to work remotely, we could be a great match. We offer a diverse role that emphasizes work-life balance, including tech-driven social activities to foster creativity and innovation. For example we arrange hack weeks, table tennis tournaments, board game nights, etc. There are also parties and physical well-being activities together with the rest of the organization.
  
You’ll be surrounded by inspiring engineers in a dynamic, forward-thinking environment. This gives you the opportunity to contribute to a company on a mission to make a meaningful impact on the global market of improving digital mental healthcare.
  
We are looking forward to hearing from you!
  
–-
  
Mindler is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to gender, gender identity or expression, national origin, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Mindler**


Mindler was founded in 2018 by two psychologists and a doctor with a shared vision of creating a world with improved mental health. Thanks to our dedicated tech teams, who developed our app and iCBT modules, Mindler has emerged as a leading provider, transforming the mental health industry.


Our tech organization is split into three teams: Growth, Treatment and Operational Efficiency. All teams work full-stack across our different applications like the patient app, psychologist web platform and back office systems.

**The Role:**

As a Software Engineer, you will be part of our Growth team, which is responsible for making sure our new patients have the best possible welcoming experience, and make sure they are guided to the right treatment and psychologist.. You'll work on both the app platform and the public web, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to develop features, optimize processes, and ensure the technical foundation is strong for future growth. If you’re passionate about building innovative solutions and improving healthcare experiences, we want to hear from you!

**What you’ll be doing:**

* Work on our app (React native/Typescript) and our public web (NextJS/Typescript, Contentful CMS), enhancing the patient journey and optimizing user experiences.
* Develop and maintain backend services using Lambdas, APIs, and other cloud technologies (AWS/Typescript).
* Collaborate with Product, Content, Marketing, and other tech teams to develop and deploy high-quality features.
* Our stack is Typescript on AWS with some data parts in GCP.
* Optionally contribute to the design and UX.
* Continuously streamline development processes to improve time-to-market and quality.

**Who are you?**

You have a bachelor in computer science (or equivalent) and over 3+ years of experience developing app and web applications, primarily using React-Native, NextJS, and TypeScript. While these are the core technologies we use, we value adaptability and believe that the right mindset is more important than any specific language.


You have a background of full-stack development from modern software development teams and you have a keen eye for UX/UI design. Additionally, you have experience from working in backend API’s, in cloud solutions and with automated testing frameworks.

**It’s a plus if you have experience with**:

* NodeJS
* tRPC
* AWS
* CloudFormation & CDK
* CMS / Contentful
* App e2e testing
* Figma
* EU Accessibility Act compliance
* User testing

**What can we offer?**


If you thrive on collaborating with talented colleagues in the office, but also appreciate the flexibility to work remotely, we could be a great match. We offer a diverse role that emphasizes work-life balance, including tech-driven social activities to foster creativity and innovation. For example we arrange hack weeks, table tennis tournaments, board game nights, etc. There are also parties and physical well-being activities together with the rest of the organization.


You’ll be surrounded by inspiring engineers in a dynamic, forward-thinking environment. This gives you the opportunity to contribute to a company on a mission to make a meaningful impact on the global market of improving digital mental healthcare.


We are looking forward to hearing from you!

*–-*

*Mindler is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to gender, gender identity or expression, national origin, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age.*

title: Senior Digital Art Director
description:
**Introduktion:**


Letar du efter en arbetsplats där du kan sätta prägel på digital design och samtidigt leda kreativa projekt till framgång? Vi söker just nu en passionerad Digital Art Director för att stärka vårt team och för att bana väg för innovation och kreativ höjd i våra kundprojekt.

### **Om rollen - Digital Art Director**


Som Digital Art Director kommer du att ansvara för att skapa varumärken samt visuellt tilltalande och funktionella digitala lösningar. Du kommer att arbeta nära andra kreativa och tekniska team för att säkerställa att designstrategier uppfyller och gärna överträffar våra kunders förväntningar. Läs gärna denna artikel om hur det kreativa arbetet på KAN går till.

#### **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Skapa nya och utveckla befintliga varumärken.
* Hålla i workshops med kund.
* Genomföra kreativa koncept som främjar varumärkets röst och visuella identitet.
* Designa grafiska profiler, webbplatser och kampanjer.
* Arbeta med designsystem.
* Arbeta i nära samarbete med utvecklings- och marknadsteam för att integrera designlösningar med digitala plattformar.
* Överse och bidra med insikter och feedback under hela projektets livscykel.
* Hålla sig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna inom digital design och teknik.

#### **Vem vi söker**

* +7 års erfarenhet av digital art direction.
* En schysst kompis som gillar musik.
* Kärlek till estetik och detaljer, samt en förmåga att se den större bilden i digitala projekt.
* Färdighet i verktyg som Adobe Creative Suite, Figma och andra designverktyg.
* Utvecklade kommunikationsfärdigheter för att effektivt samarbeta med interna och externa parter.
* Förmågan att leda andra genom att motivera och inspirera.
* Examen inom grafisk design, digital media eller relaterat område är meriterande.
* Färdigheter inom UX eller rörlig media är meriterande.

#### **Varför KAN?**


Vi erbjuder en flexibel arbetsmiljö med varierande arbetsuppgifter. Som en del av vårt team kommer du att ha möjligheten att arbeta med alltifrån startups/scaleups till stora bolag, samt privata och offentliga organisationer. Vi arbetar med nyproduktion och nya kunder samt med befintliga kunders vidareutveckling och kampanjer. Vi försöker alltid hitta arbetsuppgifter som passar medarbetarnas talang och personliga utveckling.

##### **Förmåner**

* Vi har kollektivavtal.
* Företagshälsovård och friskvårdsbidrag.
* Pension enligt kollektivavtal.
* Teamaktiviteter.
* Tillgång till kontinuerliga utbildningar och workshops.


Tror du att du är rätt person för vår kreativa resa? Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

**Ansök nu:** Skicka in din ansökan med cv och portfolio. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Experienced UX Researcher
description:
#### **Drive Innovation in User Experience at Ericsson: Shaping Research and Insights**



Ericsson is looking for a new member to join the Design and User Experience team. In this role, you'll work on diverse projects, applying both quantitative and qualitative research methods to solve challenges in our software portfolio through user experience measurement, data collection, and analysis.

  

Your strengths lie in research, collaboration, and strategic thinking. You will focus on understanding user needs, delivering great experiences, and helping organizations scale. With a positive attitude and a commitment to quality, you'll foster a culture of continuous learning.

  

Your main goal will be to establish a data-driven research culture by using various research methods, collecting and analyzing data, and interpreting findings with the right tools. You'll also contribute to usability case studies for our new usability lab, leading research plans, recruiting participants, and conducting usability tests.  

  

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Using the wide range of research approaches in your toolkit, including but not limited to: contextual inquiry, in-depth interviews, longitudinal qualitative research like diary studies, co-creation and/or PAR, validation research, usability/task analysis, secondary research, trend scanning, surveys, analyzing data sets, etc.
* Carry out and make decisions on statistical analysis of acquired raw data, using flexible and multiple approaches that can provide practical insights and design outcomes.
* Conducting workshops and co-creation sessions based on the user research.
* Synthesizing multiple data sources and insights into communication documents that present a clear message about the biggest implications for stakeholders.
* Create processes for data sharing within the DUX team, and implement the new tools and methods you see in the market.
* Helping translate both primary and secondary research findings into outputs that support ideation and concrete solutions.

 **To succeed in this role, you need:**

* Experience in human-centered design or service design.
* A degree in Anthropology, HCI, Psychology, Sociology, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
* At least 5 years of industry research experience.
* Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects.
* Demonstrated success in applying various user research methods.
* Relevant product research experience in end-to-end, usability, or generative settings.

 **Motivators:**

* Keep on understanding the complexity of mobile networks.
* Passionate about user-centric findings of the needs and perspectives of users.
* Work in cross-functional agile teams.
* Do awesome things, such as helping your team build a data-driven testing environment.
* Love user testing, utilizing our newly built UX Usability Lab.
* Driving change, explore and get out of your comfort zone.
* You are positively challenged by innovation engineering environments such as Ericsson.

 **Key Requirement:**  

Please share a portfolio of your previous work, explaining how your research outcomes contributed to project success.

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

  

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Req ID:** 753482
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Design UI & UX Intern (unpaid)
description:
**About the position:** 




 Position Type: Unpaid Internship
 



 Location : Remote
 



 Duration: 3 to 6 months (flexible)
 



 Full-time / Part-time : Flexible
 



 Start date: Immediately
 



  





**About Us:** 




 FlowerWork is an innovative startup at the forefront of AI-driven project management and blockchain technology.
 



  





 We’re on a mission to revolutionize how clients and consultants collaborate.
 



  





 We believe in the power of great design and are looking for a talented UX/UI Design Intern to help us create an exceptional user experience for our web and mobile platforms.
 



  





*We are hiring this internship position for one of our partners, a AI-driven design platform.* 





 As an early-stage startup, they're in the exciting phase of building their foundation and growing their team.
 




  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a passionate and creative UX/UI Design Intern to join our team.
 



 This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in web and app UI design within a dynamic and fast-paced startup environment. This internship is unpaid but offers invaluable experience and the chance to be part of a groundbreaking project.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Web UI Design:** 
 Create and refine user interfaces for our web platform, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.
* **App UI Design:** 
 Design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for our mobile applications.
* **User Research:** 
 Conduct user research and usability testing to gather insights and improve design decisions.
* **Wireframing & Prototyping:** 
 Develop wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to communicate design ideas effectively.
* **Collaboration:** 
 Work closely with our development team, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure design feasibility and alignment with project goals.
* **Feedback Incorporation:** 
 Iterate on designs based on feedback from users and team members.
* **Design Documentation:** 
 Maintain and update design documentation to ensure clear communication and consistency.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* **Education:** 
 Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in UX/UI Design, Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or a related field.
* **Portfolio:** 
 Strong portfolio showcasing web and app UI design projects.
* **Tools Proficiency:** 
 Proficient in design tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch, or similar is
* **User-Centered Design:** 
 Understanding of user-centered design principles and methodologies.
* **Communication:** 
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* **Detail-Oriented:** 
 Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
* **Self-Motivated:** 
 Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.



  





**What We Offer:** 



* **Real-World Experience:** 
 Gain hands-on experience designing for both web and mobile platforms in a real-world startup environment.
* **Mentorship:** 
 Receive guidance and mentorship from experienced designers and developers.
* **Portfolio Development:** 
 Build a strong portfolio with tangible projects and designs that have real impact.
* **Networking:** 
 Connect with industry professionals and expand your professional network.
* **Flexible Schedule:** 
 Work remotely with flexible hours to accommodate your academic or personal commitments.



  





**How to Apply:** 




 Interested candidates should submit their resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining their interest in the internship.
 



  





**Note:** 




 This is an unpaid internship. We are in the early stages of our startup and cannot offer financial compensation at this time. However, the experience and skills you gain will be invaluable for your career development.
 



  





 Join us in shaping the future of project management and consultant collaboration with cutting-edge design!
 



 We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Founding Product Designer
description:
We are looking for a Product Designer who is passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. As a Founding Product Designer, you'll shape our product, ensuring it’s engaging, user-friendly and cutting-edge.
   

  

*Key responsibilities include*
* End-to-end Design Ownership: You will research solutions, ideate with the engineering team, and turn them interactive prototypes to engage with users
* Stakeholder Management: You’ll work closely with engineers, lawyers and all parts of a law form. You will be pivotal in bridging the gap from concept to launch.


**Who You Are**
* Design Expert: Your portfolio demonstrates your ability to create intuitive, visually engaging designs that solve real user problems.
* Curious: You thrive on learning new things, and is comfortable in not knowing all the answers. You're excited by understanding complex processes and putting yourself in the shoes of different users within different law firms
* Collaborative: You actively seek feedback, facilitate design discussions, and ensure smooth collaboration with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders.
* Self-starter: You don’t wait for directions – you proactively take ownership of projects, from concept to delivery. You value feedback and iterate to improve your designs while keeping the end goal in mind.


**About Leya**
 We’re a (growing!) team of hackers, designers, researchers, and all other kinds of wizards. In just one year, we’ve moved from three friends to the leading provider for the worlds top law firms and legal departments. With backing from Benchmark, Redpoint and Y-Combinator, we’re thrilled to embark on the next phase of our journey.
   

  

 Practical details
   

  

* You’ll get a competitive salary, and you’ll get to own part of the company via stock options
* Office in central Stockholm 3 minute walk to central metro station
* You will work on-site
* We use English for internal communication
* Start date: Q4


**Preferred Qualifications**
* 3+ years of B2B SaaS experience in product design, specifically in UI/UX.
* Experience working in a legal tech is a strong advantage.
* Proven track record of designing user-friendly interfaces for complex applications.


 We founded Leya with the vision of giving lawyers the tools they deserve.
   

  

 We didn't build Leya for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.

title: Senior Produktägare / Product Owner / Product Manager
description:
**Senior Produktägare / Product Owner / Product Manager** 




  





 Boulder är en konsultbyrå och inkubator byggd av experter inom tech, design och affärsstrategi. Vi som jobbar på Boulder delar ett intresse för modern tech, bra design och smarta affärsidéer. Vi bygger produkter och lösningar i världsklass – alltid med människan i fokus. Med kontor i Stockholm och Göteborg arbetar vi med kunder som Volvo, SEB, Mojang, Northvolt och Tele2. Vi är stolta över att ha skapat en miljö där talanger trivs och där våra konsulter får möjlighet att växa och utmana sig själva. Nu söker vi en erfaren Produktägare för att ansluta till vårt team och leda spännande produkter och uppdrag hos våra kunder.
 



  





**Rollbeskrivning:** 




 I rollen som Senior Produktägare kommer du att fungera som navet i våra projekt, och vara ansvarig för att säkerställa att våra kunders behov omsätts till framgångsrika produkter och tjänster. Du kommer att samarbeta nära med olika intressenter, inklusive utvecklare, UX-designers, kravställare och andra teammedlemmar. Din expertis inom agil produktutveckling och din erfarenhet av att arbeta med olika team och stakeholders kommer att vara avgörande för att driva framgångsrika projekt.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Minst 8 års erfarenhet av produktledning eller produktägarrollen
* Teknisk universitetsutbildning eller motsvarande
* Djup teknisk förståelse, trivs i ledarrollen och starkt intresse för affären
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i produktteam med UX-designers, utvecklare, kravställare och andra intressenter
* Starka färdigheter inom stakeholder management och kommunikation
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i både stora och mindre organisationer är meriterande
* Certifierad inom agila metoder (t.ex. Agil CPO, Scrum, Kanban)
* Flytande svenska och engelska



  





 Ansökan:
 



 Om du är en driven och erfaren produktledare som vill vara en del av ett dynamiskt och framgångsrikt team, så är det här en fantastisk möjlighet för dig. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Junior produktägare inom e-handel till Gårdssällskapet!
description:
Gårdssällskapet grundades 2013 och erbjuder ekologiskt, småskaligt och vilt producerat kött direkt från gården hem till dörren. De fokuserar på personlig service och hög kvalitet, där majoriteten av försäljningen sker via e-handel med prenumeration på Stamkundslådan. Gårdssällskapet köper direkt från den ekologiska gården, styckar i egen regi innan de levererar ut till konsument. På huvudkontoret arbetar idag runt 20 personer, hela bolaget har runt 32 anställda. I och med den tillväxtresa Gårdssällskapet befinner sig i får du verkligen möjligheten att påverka och göra skillnad! Låter det som något för dig? Läs vidare!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Gårdssällskapet AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna/Sundbyberg
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Gårdssällskapets e-handel bär en central del i försäljningen och det är av stor vikt att den hela tiden utvecklas för att möta kundernas behov och förväntningar. Som produktägare ansvarar du för att kravställa utvecklingsärenden och diskutera idéer om hur ni kan förbättra e-handelsplattformen ur både ett tekniskt och grafiskt perspektiv. Du analyserar kund- och försäljningsdata, säkerställer att sajten är uppdaterad och driver projekt inom CRO, SEO och UX. Du jobbar nära din närmaste chef, Martina Uhrstedt (Head of Sales), IT och Marknad.
 


  


  

**Några ord från din framtida närmsta chef**



  


 "Hej! Jag heter Martina och är säljchef på Gårdssällskapet. Vi jobbar med ekologiska produkter som vi är stolta över, och du får vara med och förbättra vår e-handel både tekniskt och grafiskt i en öppen och familjär atmosfär. Som produktägare ansvarar du för kravställning av utvecklingsärenden, att hålla vår sajt uppdaterad och du analyserar data för att hitta förbättringsområden. Som chef vill jag ge dig möjlighet att driva på inom ditt arbetsområde och få ett kvitto på det du gör. Jag ser fram emot att arbeta tillsammans med dig!"
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Arbete i ett bolag som satsar på att växa
  
* En möjlighet att påverka och bidra med dina kunskaper
  
* Arbete i ett dynamiskt och personligt bolag
  
* Tjänstepension, 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag, dator, telefonm förmånligt pris på Gårdssällskapets produkter m.m.
  


  


  

**Arbetsuppgifter**



  


 Du kommer att arbeta i en bred roll som junior produktägare med allt från att samla in och prioritera utvecklingsbehov från säljavdelningen, testa funktioner i kundresan efter releaser, hantera produkter i e-handeln, ta fram och analysera data på vår trafik och trafikanskaffning för att ge förslag på förbättringar. försäljningssiffror och ge förslag på förbättring inom sortimentet/kunderbjudandet. Fokuset är framförallt att jobba med e-handeln och systemen ur ett tekniskt perspektiv där du har systemansvar för verktyg som GA4, Tag Manager, Merchant Center, Cookie consent-modul m.fl. Du arbetar aktivt med analyser av webbplatsen och kundbeteenden och proaktivt lyfter förbättringsområden.
 


  


 Vidare kommer du exempelvis...
 


  

  
* Säkerställa efterlevnad av gällande regler och best practice för en e-handel
  
* Löpande rapportera försäljningsstatistik och ansvar för uppsättning av dashboards i Looker Studio
  
* Mindre uppdateringar av hemsidans innehåll
  


  


 När tillfälle ges kommer du att fördjupa dig inom olika analysområden där utgångspunkten är att dina projekt ska assistera företagets långsiktiga mål inom exempelvis CRO, SEO och kundlojalitet.
   




**Vi söker dig som**

 Vi söker dig som är en lagspelare och som vill jobba brett, du är självgående och trivs i en säljdriven organisation och har ett stort intresse för att samarbeta med såväl IT som marknad för att nå de bästa lösningarna tillsammans. Vi ser även att du är flexibel och någorlunda självgående med en förmåga att anpassa dig efter nya förutsättningar.
   

 I denna rekrytering kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dig som person och ditt intresse för tjänsten och Gårdssällskapet som företag, motivera väl i din ansökan varför du valt att söka.
 


  


 Utöver det har du...
 


  

  
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom e-handel där du arbetat med liknande arbetsuppgifter
  
* Har arbetat administrativt med en e-handelsplattform och verktyg likt GA4
  
* Är van kravställare av utvecklingsärenden och har förståelse för teknisk SEO
  
* Duktig på att ta fram, hantera och analysera data
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska då det är det primära arbetsspråket
  


  


  

**Övrigt information**



  

  
* Start: enligt överenskommelse
  
* Omfattning: heltid
  
* Placering: Solna, möjlighet till remotearbete ett par dagar i veckan
  
* Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och alla frågor kring processen hanteras av Academic Work.
  
* Kontaktuppgifter: Ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Johanna Sörell, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se samt rekryteringskoordinator Minna Loosaar, minna.loosaar@academicwork.se
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Gårdssällskapet AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Johanna Sörell eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107256

title: Localization Manager
description:
At EasyPark, we love cities. We love them for work, for play, and everything in between. That’s why our vision is to make cities more livable! EasyPark Group is a global company and a true leader in its domain. There is a clear ambition to quickly grow in coverage and offer our services to more customers and partners.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity to become part of the EasyPark team as our first Localization Manager. You will play a key role in our future success and have a true opportunity to make a real impact and difference for our users and our business!
   

  

**Firstly, a Bit About The Team**
 As a Localization Manager you’ll work out of our central Product Design team, together with some 20 UX designers, writers, and researchers. You’ll report to our UX Writing Lead, and work closely with partners and stakeholders across the organization.
   

  

 The larger product organization consists of over 450 talented specialists within product, engineering, design and analytics, located in Stockholm, Amsterdam, Basingstoke, Tallinn and Atlanta.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* You’ll be responsible for making sure that all EasyPark users across the globe get the same excellent experience, regardless of which language their device is set to.
* This role is our first that’s dedicated to localization, so we’re looking for a trailblazer who’s motivated to organize and build our localization processes, and who has the necessary understanding of linguistic complexity to make it happen.
* You’ll keep in close contact with our product managers and your main focus will be on content and translations. But we’ll also rely on you for direction on matters like internationalization and local demands.
* You’ll be coaching our internal translators crew who work in different roles but set aside time every week to translate our products. They have excellent knowledge of our products and the local needs and quirks, but they need you to provide consistency, documentation, and keep it all together.
* You’ll also be liaising with our developers, driving standardization and cooperating around the translation management system and other localization matters.
* And, perhaps more than anything, you’ll be our localization champion throughout the organization, educating us and pushing our localization efforts forward.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Plan and execute localization roadmap through communication and collaboration with stakeholders.
* Provide glossaries, training, reference materials, and support for our localizers.
* Manage and resolve questions between multiple localization stakeholders (translators, designers, developers, product managers, local organizations etc).
* Manage, develop, and refine our localization tools and workflows.
* Be the champion for internationalization, culturalization, and localization. to ensure any cultural and technical localization issues are caught early.
* Engage and build relationships across the organization and evangelize localization and internationalization best practices
* Plan and manage localization schedules, collaborating cross-functionally to manage timelines
* Drive initiatives to foster innovation within strategic areas of focus such as internationalization, data, quality, tools and process optimization


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* 5+ years of experience in localization management
* Demonstrated knowledge of internationalization and localization standards
* Excellent communication skills
* Fluent English, both written and spoken
* Solid understanding of app and web development processes
* Curiosity, organizational skills, and great attention to detail
* Passion for building relationships and working together in a diverse team across departments
* Experience of prioritizing and managing multiple projects simultaneously
* Patience and ability to continuously move things forwards, inch by inch
* Previous experience working with a Translation Management System (TMS) and other tools like, JIRA, Figma, and Confluence


*We expect you to share a portfolio of your favorite projects, so we can see how you work and your track record of shipping excellent products across markets and languages.*
 This role is based in
 **Stockholm,Sweden.**
**What We Offer**
* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurances & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurances
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Mental well-being support via Blue Call
* Wellness reimbursement: 5000 SEK/year


**Life at EasyPark**
 We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.

title: E-commerce Analyst
description:
**Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights, TUI, etc.** 




  





**Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2500 passionate professionals is what makes us the industry’s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India, Uruguay and Poland.** 




  





**The role** 




 We are seeking an E-commerce Analyst who embraces the combination of an entrepreneurial sales mindset and analytics. You are a data-driven professional focused on creating conversion-centric experiences to drive the metrics that matter the most for us as an e-commerce team. As an E-commerce Analyst you will be a key player in a test focused e-commerce team and responsible for optimizing CR and the user experience on both a global and local market level.
 



  





 You will be working with the whole A/B-testing process in a very cross-functional environment including other e-commerce analysts, product managers, designers, product owners and developers. With a strong sales focus, you will drive insights from analyzing both qualitative and quantitative research, set up and execute actions based on your insights. You will drive both feature development and sales actions.
 



  





 Alongside continuously driving CR-development you will be project managing key initiatives within the e-commerce field. You will project lead both strategic initiatives as well as project origin from your research and insights.
 



 You should have an understanding and hands-on experience with A/B testing, website analytics and the UX-conversion tactics that help drive both performance and insights.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Responsible to drive CR-development and e-commerce KPIs on specific markets
* Analyze user data and KPIs throughout the customer journey and drive actionable insights
* End-to-end management of A/B tests and coordination with stakeholders
* End-to-end management of feature development including setting UX- and tech requirements in close collaboration with PO, tech lead and UX-designer.
* Project management of e-commerce related projects



  





**Requirements** 




 Building strong relationships and close collaboration with stakeholders, ux-designers, Product owners, developers and team members.
 


* Demonstrating a passion for continuous learning, improving and an entrepreneurial spirit to optimize our sales and customer experience.
* Experience in A/B-testing and relevant degree
* A need to understand user behavior
* Experience in different analytic tools, GA, QlikView, Looker
* Preferable basic front-end development knowledge and GTM
* Preferable experience in SEO
* Strong communication skills in English and Swedish (both spoken and written)



  





**Benefits** 




 Working at Etraveli Group means working at a fast-growing company with high ambitions in becoming the number one Online travel agency worldwide. The culture at the company embraces complexity and we like to keep the entrepreneurial spirit even as we grow into being a larger company. You will have awesome colleagues with whom you will have fun solving complex problems in a fast-moving business.
 



  





 We also offer:
 


* A flexible working environment. We work on a hybrid-model where you can choose to work two days from home and you will have two weeks per year that you can choose to work from a remote location
* Central office location in the City – We are located on Regeringsgatan in Stockholm, a stone's throw from public transport and lunch restaurants.
* Healthcare allowance – Each employee receives a maximum allowable amount each year according to the Swedish Tax Agency to spend on health-promoting activities such as a gym card, massage etc.
* Pension and health insurance – Through partners we offer a comprehensive pension and health insurance so that you can get help quickly in case of an accident



  





**As part of this recruitment process, we will be conducting background checks. You will be able to read more information and give your consent to this process in the application form.** 




  





 At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds. During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.
 



  





 Welcome to Etraveli Group!

title: Delivery Manager - Technical Onboarding
description:
Trustly is leading the human-centric payments revolution. To us, this means passionately building the most convenient, intelligent and responsible way of paying for things online. Whether it’s for shopping, paying subscriptions, funding trading accounts, booking airfare, playing online games and much more – we’re all about a better way to pay. At our core, we are a tech company with industry-leading tech capabilities. But, it’s the ingenuity of our people that makes us leaders in our field. Thus, our appetite for innovation will never be anything less than fierce. Trustly is steadily growing as it connects thousands of businesses with hundreds of millions of people. And with a strong presence across Europe and the Americas, we are leading the human-centric payment revolution as a truly global team.
 




  





**About the Role** 





 The merchant onboarding & life-cycle team plays a crucial part in ensuring that our clients are onboarded quickly and with high integration quality with Trustly, which is one of the company's highest priorities. As our Delivery Manager, you will support Trustly clients across all our businesses (E-commerce, Financial Services, Gaming, and Travel) during the onboarding process. Our team is currently based in Stockholm, London, and Malta, and together, we ensure that our clients have a smooth experience while they implement our products and solutions quickly and with high quality.
 









  




**What you’ll do** 
* Guide the clients to implementing the most suitable Trustly product solution by becoming an expert on Trustly’s products and architecture
* Manage multiple clients simultaneously, balancing business-level and technical conversations across different client organization levels. Support our commercial teams in technical discussions with our clients
* Conducting rigorous testing in both UAT (User Acceptance Testing), UX verification, and production environments to ensure flawless integration and smooth transaction processing
* Analyze, monitor, and interpret client performance the first 30-60 days when going live with Trustly and collaborate across Trustly teams to resolve issues and increase effectiveness. This includes driving customer optimization discussions with the client  – UX improvements, best practices, etc
* Be in contact with our clients via video call, messaging or email, and occasionally on-site during workshops and demos
* Ensure a smooth handoff from pre-sales to post-sales



  




**Who you are** 
* You have 3+ years of experience working in a technical role (preferably fintech/online payments) and have a solid understanding of API integrations, and the ability to explain API concepts to both technical and non-technical customer stakeholders
* Detail-oriented and data-driven; ability to understand data sets and leverage this data to drive customer outcomes and adoption
* A passion for technology and problem-solving and an aptitude to learn quickly and rapidly build domain and product knowledge at Trustly
* You are service-minded and customer-focused. Ability to leverage your business acumen to assess client needs and drive outcomes
* Great verbal and written communication skills. Ability to successfully manage multiple client interactions independently, at all levels, with high quality and grace under pressure
* Excellent collaborator with the skills needed to engage across multiple teams (Product, Engineering, Marketing, Sales, Risk, Support) and multiple geographies to drive the outcomes needed to ensure success


 Bonus if you have 
 * Prior experience at a growth-stage internet/software company (preferably fintech/online payments)
* Experience with tools like Qlik or Tableau
* Prior experience working with enterprise companies as well as tech-savvy start-ups
* Proven project management skills or a strong desire to build those skills
* Experience working towards the German market or if you are German-speaking






  




  



 Kindly submit your CV in English.
 









 Are you someone who voices new ideas and acts on them? Do you value great communication with all stakeholders? We are looking to strengthen the team with dedicated, highly motivated people who thrive in working with different areas across the organisation.
 









 If you feel that your skill set and personality compliments the criteria above, please apply now.

title: Lead Architect ServiceNow
description:
*Vill du påverka och göra skillnad på riktigt? Här bidrar du till att skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen. Det du gör spelar roll.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Vi letar efter en Lead Architect med stort driv och engagemang som tar tekniskt ansvar för vår ServiceNow platform. Som Lead Architect är du ansvarig för Architecture roadmap, i nära samarbete med Serviceowner och service manager. Plattformen används av över ca 17 000 medarbetare och vårt gemensamma mål är att skapa värdefulla och enkla interaktioner för alla dessa användare. Vår förvaltning består av olika team där Utvecklare, Business Analysts, UX designers, Service Managers och Service Owner ingår.
   

  

 Några av dina arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Tekniskt ansvarig för vår ServiceNow platform
* Leda flera utvecklare (team lead)
* Arbeta bort teknisk skuld
* Utveckla flöden i olika delar av ServiceNow
* Analysera krav och omsätta till tekniska specifikationer
* Delta i workshops och dialoger med verksamhet/kund
* Omvärldsbevakning och föreslå nya platformsfunctionaliteter
* Arbeta proactivt till att minska ledtid och automatisera uppgraderingar och testflöden


 Din profil
   

  

 Gillar du att utmanas av komplexa frågeställningar, samarbeta och skapa värdefull utveckling? Då har du hittat rätt!
   

  

 För att passa hos oss tror vi att du har minst åtta års erfarenhet av ServiceNow-utveckling, varav fyra år eller mer i en arkitektroll. Du är en prestigelös person som hela tiden strävar efter nya kunskaper och lärdomar samt att bli ditt bästa jag. Du trivs att jobba agilt, tar egna initiativ och är hjälpsam i din natur. Vidare är du analytiskt lagd, nyfiken på teknik och kan arbeta både med detaljer och ett helhetsperspektiv.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har erfarenhet inom följande områden:
   

  

* Relevant akademisk utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Djup förståelse för ServiceNow-plattformens kapaciteter, bästa praxis och implementeringsstrategier
* Starkt ledarskap och kommunikationsförmåga
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla och automatisera flöden/processer i ServiceNow
* Haft workshops och dialog med verksamhet/kund


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* On-prem / Self-hosted
* Implementation av ServiceNow eller någon av dess moduler.
* Följande moduler
* Performance Analytics
* CMDB
* SPM/APM
* GRC/SecOps


 Det är positivt om du har certifikat inom ServiceNow
 *(exempelvis: Certified System Administrator (CSA), Certified System Administrator (CSA), Certified Application Developer (CAD), Certified Implementation Specialist, Certified Implementation Specialist).*
 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap
   

  

 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

 På Saab kommer du bli anställd inom Group IT. Group IT är en central funktion på Saab som verkar för alla våra verksamhetsområden och ansvarar för att möjliggöra Saabs verksamhet globalt genom att tillhandahålla erforderliga produkter och tjänster inom informationsteknologi med höga krav bland annat på IT säkerhet.
   

  

 Observera att du kan ansöka på antingen svenska eller engelska
   

  

 Om du är intresserad av vilka förmåner som du kan ta del av som anställd på Saab i Sverige, kan du läsa om dem här
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: IT Uppdrag
description:
Vi söker en .NET utvecklare till myndighet inom det svenska kraftsystemet.
   

  

 Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Du kommer vara anställd av Centio Consulting Group AB och arbeta som konsult.
   

  

 Tjänsten är på heltid, och säkerhetsprövning krävs.
   

  

 Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.
   

  

**Uppdraget**
 Myndigheten är den som ansvarar för att elöverföringssystemet är säkert, miljöanpassat och kostnadseffektivt – i dag och i framtiden. Den drivs i form av ett statligt affärsverk, och har drygt 1400 medarbetare varav de flesta arbetar på huvudkontoret i Sundbyberg.
   

  

 Mycket händer inom elmarknads- och kraftsystemområdena, bl.a. genom energiomställning och utökat nordiskt och europeiskt samarbete. Ett flertal spännande projekt pågår hos myndigheten där de utvecklar bl.a. olika stödsystem för att möta nya behov. Myndigheten söker nu en systemutvecklare .NET, som ska förstärka projekt och förvaltning.
   

  

 Uppdraget omfattar att vara systemutvecklare i viktiga utvecklings- och implementeringsprojekt, Uppdraget kan även innebära arbete i andra projekt och förvaltningar där utveckling och hantering av befintliga system ingår.
   

  

 Ett projekt som konsulten kommer att arbeta i omfattar realisering av ett nytt system som används som logg för de analyser som driftanalytikerna arbetar med. Dessutom skapar systemet data för att beräkna kapaciteter i samarbete med de övriga nordiska länderna. I teamet finns utvecklare, kravanalytiker, UX-Designer, lösningsarkitekt, testare, verksamhetsexpert samt projektledare. Myndigheten arbetar agilt och leveranser sker i sprintar. Systemet som utvecklas ska också möta högt ställda krav på IT säkerhet.
   

  

 Att konsulten är intresserad av systemarkitektur och IT arkitektur ser myndigheten som en fördel. Att utveckla och testa med IT-säkerhet i fokus och är intresserad av systemarkitektur och säkerhet är ett plus.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
* Rollen som systemutvecklare i projekt och förvaltningar kan innehålla följande arbetsuppgifter:
* Design och arkitektur av systemlösningar
* Ansvara för kravhantering relaterat till objektet
* Utveckling och test av systemlösningar, både back-end och webb
* Ta fram eller uppdatera dokumentation i form av krav- och designdokument
* Ta fram eller uppdatera systemdokumentation
* Samarbete inom teamet men även med andra delar av organisationen
* Hantering och prioritering av backlogg i scrum team


**Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**
 Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet på en myndighet under de senaste 10 åren
   

  

 Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling i Visual Studio och .Net under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

 Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av front-endutveckling med .Net Razor pages under de senaste 5 åren
   

  

 Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling mot MS-SQL databaser under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

 Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med .Net Core under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

 Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med Entity Framework Core under de senaste 5 åren
   

  

 Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla REST API:er under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

**Meriterande**
 Deltagit i minst ett projekt där Azure DevOps har använts för ärende- och kravhantering under de senaste 5 åren
   

  

 Erfarenhet av minst 1 års arbete som produktägare under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

 Erfarenhet från minst ett projekt där uppsättning av CI/CD pipe-lines genomförts under de senaste 5 åren
   

  

 Erfarenhet av minst 2 års arbete inom elmarknads eller kraftsystemområdet under de senaste 8 åren
   

  

 Erfarenhet av minst ett uppdrag att ha arbetat med systemarkitektur
   

  

**Om oss**
 Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.
   

  

 Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.
   

  

 Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.
   

  

 För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.
   

  

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Second Line Support
description:
*Brinner du för IT och älskar att lösa tekniska problem? Vi söker en erfaren och engagerad Second Line Support som har en passion för att leverera högkvalitativ support och problemlösning.*


Avoki erbjuder flexibla, säkra och hållbara IT-lösningar som tar kunden in i framtiden. Nyckeln till vår framgång ligger i ett fokus på kunderna och kärnverksamheten i kombination med den enskilde medarbetarens vidareutveckling. Vi trivs tillsammans och ser det som en självklarhet att dela med oss av kunskap, kompetens och insikter.

**Om tjänsten**


I rollen som Second Line Support kommer du att vara en viktig del av vårt team, där du hanterar användarstöd och tekniska lösningar i en dynamisk och växande IT-miljö. Som Second Line tekniker har du en central roll i att säkerställa support för våra kunders användare och deras IT-system. Du kommer att arbeta nära vårt First Line-team, där du tar över och löser mer avancerade problem, samt stöttar vid implementation och drift av våra IT-lösningar.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Felsökning, administration och hantering av ärenden relaterade till Microsoft 365, Azure, Active Directory och Intune.
* Hantering av klienter och enheter genom Microsoft Intune (MDM).
* Säkerställa säker och smidig driftsättning av nya enheter och applikationer.
* Underhåll och support av virtuella servrar och molntjänster.
* Drift och felsökning av nätverk (LAN/WAN).
* Arbeta med IT-säkerhet och identifiera säkerhetsrisker.
* Samverka med tredje part för att lösa mer komplexa tekniska problem.
* Dokumentation av processer, ärenden och lösningar i våra system.

**Kvalifikationer**

* Erfarenhet från 2nd Line support, eller långvarig erfarenhet från 1st Line support och redo att ta nästa steg.
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* B-körkort då resor kan förekomma.

**Meriterande**

* Felsökning: Erfarenhet av att identifiera och lösa komplexa tekniska problem.
* Microsoft 365: Användarhantering, felsökning och administration.
* Microsoft Intune & Autopilot: Hantering och konfiguration av enheter.
* Microsoft Azure: Administration av molnresurser, säkerhet och identitetsstyrning.
* Microsoft Exchange: E-postadministration och underhåll.
* Active Directory: Användaradministration, grupphantering och policies.
* Windows Server: Konfiguration och underhåll.
* PowerShell: Skriptning för automatisering och felsökning.
* SharePoint: Administration och support.
* Nätverk: Installation och felsökning av nätverk.

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**

* Generösa förmåner som Lunchkort, Friskvårdstimme & Friskvårdsbidrag
* Kontinuerlig utveckling genom certifieringar och utbildningsprogram
* Flexibel arbetsplats
* Ett företag som värderar en god balans mellan arbete och fritid


Ansökningen stänger 31 oktober men vi kan komma att tillsätta rollen innan dess. Om du har frågor om rollen går det bra att kontakta Service Desk Manager, Romain Brattlöf 010–8584503.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!

title: Senior Cyber Security Architect
description:
**Why this job is fo****r you**
-------------------------------


We are now looking for a Senior Cybersecurity Architect to help **shape the future** of **secure solutions for our clients**. In this role, you will **lead the design** and **implementation of robust cybersecurity architectures** for clients in industries such as **automotive** and **manufacturing**. You will not only be a technical expert but also a mentor and leader for a team of junior cybersecurity professionals. Your role will ensure that security initiatives align with both technical requirements and the business objectives of our clients.

 **Key responsibilities**

* Develop and implement comprehensive cybersecurity architectures that follow both industry standards and client-specific requirements.
* Integrate security solutions throughout the product development process, from initial design to deployment, with a focus on protecting against emerging threats.
* Ensure that products, including embedded systems and IoT devices within the automotive and manufacturing sectors, are secured according to the latest regulations and best practices.
* Lead security assessments to identify and mitigate potential risks.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients by acting as a trusted advisor and supporting them in integrating security into their business objectives.
* Collaborate with our sales team to identify new business opportunities and participate in client meetings and presentations.

**Qualifications*** At least a BCs degree in Cyber Security, information technology, computer science or related field.
* A minimum of five years of experience in cyber security architecture - with a strong focus on product and infrastructure security.
* Deep understanding of cybersecurity principles, practices, and tools, and how they are applied in complex technical environments.
* Extensive knowledge of European cybersecurity regulations such as NIS2, the EU Data Act, and the Cyber Resilience Act.
* Experience in leading and developing teams, ideally in technical fields, with a passion for supporting the professional growth of others.

 **Nice to have**

* Proficient in Swedish, both written and spoken.
* Experience in sales support or business development in a consulting environment.
* Certifications such as CISSP, CISM, CRISC or CISA.

**About Knightec**
